info.name: Firefox App button - Styled like window controls
info.description: Makes the Firefox App Button blend into the titlebar and makes the titlebar more symmetrical, by making it look like the window controls (minimize, maximize/restore, exit buttons).
info.additionalInfo:
Works with any glass color.

Version 1.0.1 (Jul 27 2011)
Minor fixes.

Version 1.0 (Jul 19 2011)
First release.
